page.title: 06CROFTING
page.content: A CROFT IS A SMALL HOLDING.USUALLY IT HAS ABOUT 40 TO 60 ACHRES OF LAND IN IT.A CROFT IS MUCH SMALLER THAN A FARM.A CROFT HAS A COMMON GRAZING DETACHED TO IT.IF YOU WERE GOING TO START BEING A CROFTER YOU WOULD HAVE TO SEE IF THERE WAS A CROFT AVALIABLE. CROFTING IS QUITE A HARD JOB YOU HAVE TO REAR THE SHEEP AND THE CATTLE.AND SOMETIMES YOU GROW CROPS LIKE POTATOES,GRASS AND OATS.ONCE A YEAR YOU WOULD SHEER THE SHEEP AND DIP THEM.ONE PERSON COULD RUN A CROFT IF HE WAS FIT.SHEEP,COWS AND SOMETINES HORSES ARE ON CROFTS. THE CROFTERS SELL THERE ANIMALS BETWEEN OCTOBER AND SEPTEMBER. THE VEHICALS YOU NEED ON A CROFT ARE A TRACTOR OR A LAND_ROVER ON IT.CROFTS DO NOT USUALLY HAVE THE SAME THINGS ON THEM.ON RAASAY THERE ARE ABOUT 20 TO 30 CROFTS.
